articles.title: Moon 'wobble,' climate change seen as driving coastal flooding in 2030s - TODAYonline
articles.description: U.S. coastlines will face increasing flooding in the mid-2030s thanks to a regular lunar cycle that will magnify rising sea levels caused by climate change, according to research led by NASA scientists.

articles.title: Hong Lim Market and Food Centre, Jurong Fishery Port and restaurant to close after 2 new Covid-19 clusters form - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Hong Lim Market and Food Centre, Jurong Fishery Port, and Khoi Grill and Hotpot will have to close for two weeks after new clusters of Covid-19 cases were linked to these places.
